channel.title: [pi] Mod/admin crowns aren't transperant [pi]
channel.description:
Hey guys, so i was tired of gay costums crowns the server had, so i decided to replace them with the normal runescape ones
so i dled the crowns, but coudln't edit them in photoshop for a reason :S
anyways so i did it in paint with that purple background, and it shows purple background ingame....
anyone knows how to get that away??
and does it work if i make a print screen of a crown copy paste them in photoshop deleting background and save as a .png will that work on a client??
